Instruction: Dice the cucumber, red bell pepper, and red onion into small pieces.
In a large bowl, combine the diced mango, cucumber, red bell pepper, and red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Sprinkle chopped cilantro over the salad before serving.
Serve immediately as a vibrant and refreshing side dish.
